text: A form of #VaccineRedlining seems to be taking place in the #DMV & US The group hardest hit by #COVID19 is least likely to receive the #vaccine, and the gap isn’t just about distrust. It’s because rollout is delayed, lines are long, & people from other areas are jumping the line https://t.co/5DHo3QARfo https://t.co/ykEV23vXEk
